query:
SELECT
                a.id as "id!",
                a.asset_class as "asset_class!",
                CASE
                    WHEN a.asset_class='currency' THEN c.iso_code
                    ELSE s.name
                END as "name!"
            FROM
                assets a
                LEFT JOIN stocks s ON a.id = s.id
                LEFT JOIN currencies c ON a.id = c.id
